description.brazilian: Consiga Bouncink
description.english: Get Bouncink
description.french: Obtenir Bouncink
description.german: Erhalte Bouncink
description.italian: Ottieni Bouncink
description.japanese: Bouncinkをゲット！
description.spanish: Consigue Bouncink

description.brazilian: Você devia ter segurado essa porta!
description.english: You should have held that door!
description.french: Vous auriez dû retenir cette porte
description.german: Du hättest diese Tür aufhalten sollen!
description.italian: Avresti dovuto tenere quella porta!
description.japanese: ドアを開けておくべきだった！
description.spanish: ¡Deberías haber mantenido esa puerta abierta!

description.brazilian: Fui nocauteado, mas me levantei novamente!
description.english: I get knocked out, but I get up again!
description.french: Vingt fois à terre, vingt fois debout !
description.german: Ich gehe zu Boden, doch ich stehe auch wieder auf!
description.italian: Cadere sette volte e rialzarsi otto.
description.japanese: ただでは転ばないぞ！
description.russian: Я был выбит, но я снова проснулся!
description.schinese: 我被干翻了，但我会回来的！
description.spanish: ¡He caído, pero vuelvo a levantarme!

description.brazilian: Os verdadeiros amigos são aqueles que aparecem quando você mais precisa
description.english: A friend in need is a friend indeed
description.french: L'amitié n'a de sens que si elle est prête à se prouver par un sacrifice
description.german: Freunde in der Not, gehen Tausend auf ein Lot
description.italian: Un vero amico si vede nel momento del bisogno
description.japanese: まさかの時の友こそ真の友
description.spanish: En la necesidad se demuestra la amistad

description.brazilian: Está tudo correndo muito bem
description.english: It's all going splendidly
description.french: Non, il va bien, tout va très bien
description.german: Alles läuft prächtig
description.italian: Sta andando tutto a meraviglia
description.japanese: 全て順調だ
description.spanish: Todo marcha a la perfección

description.brazilian: Permita-se ir para o Lado Escuro
description.english: Give yourself to the Dark Side
description.french: Laissez vous envahir par le côté obscur
description.german: Schließe dich der dunklen Seite an
description.italian: Arrenditi al lato oscuro
description.japanese: ダークサイドに堕ちよう
description.spanish: Únete al lado oscuro

description.brazilian: Você nunca vai me derrubar!
description.english: You're never going to keep me down!
description.french: Quand il retombe, je le repousse
description.german: Du wirst mich niemals aufhalten können!
description.italian: Mi piego ma non mi spezzo!
description.japanese: やられても立ち上げれ！
description.spanish: ¡No me vais a parar!

description.brazilian: Alguém quer batatas fritas?
description.english: Fries anyone?
description.french: On va manger ... des chips !
description.german: Jemand Lust auf Pommes?
description.italian: Chi vuole delle patatine?
description.japanese: ポテト食べる？
description.spanish: ¿Alguien quiere patatas fritas?

displayName.japanese: スプラッシュ・ダメージ

description.brazilian: Um bom Batatroop é um Batatroop afogado!
description.english: A good Potatrooper is a drowned Potatrooper!
description.french: Une bonne Patatroupe est une Patatroupe noyée !
description.german: Ein guter Katokämpfer ist ein ertrunkener Katokämpfer!
description.italian: Una buona Patatruppa è una Patatruppa affondata!
description.japanese: 良いポテトルーパーは死んだポテトルーパーだ！
description.koreana: 가장 착한 감자 부대는 물에 빠진 감자 부대다!
description.schinese: 淹死的土豆兵才是好的土豆兵！
description.spanish: La buena Patatrooper es la Patatrooper ahogada

description.spanish: Empieza lo bueno

description.schinese: 是你打电话来了吗，长官？

description.brazilian: Consiga todas as vitórias. Depois disso, você é definitivamente um dos melhores jogadores do planeta, talvez até o melhor de sempre! Continue a provar isso nas classificações!
description.english: Get all the Achievements. After that, you are definitely one of the best players on the planet, perhaps even the best ever! Continue to prove it in the leaderboards!
description.french: Obtenir tous les succès. Après cela, vous êtes incontestablement un des meilleurs joueurs de la planète, voir même le meilleur. Continuez à le prouver dans les classements !
description.german: Schalte alle Errungenschaften frei. Danach gehörst du definitiv zu den besten Spielern auf diesem Planeten – wahrscheinlich bist du sogar der beste, der je auf dieser Erde gewandelt ist! Beweise dein Können auch weiterhin in den Bestenlisten!
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i trofei e diventa uno dei migliori giocatori del pianeta, anzi dell'universo! Continua a dimostrarlo nelle classifiche!
description.japanese: 全ての実績を獲得する。そうすればきっとあなたはトッププレイヤー、いや、世界一のプレイヤーになれるかもしれません！ランキングの1位を目指しましょう！
description.koreana: 모든 도전 과제를 성공하십시오. 이제 당신은 전세계를 통틀어 가장 뛰어난 플레이어임에 틀림없습니다. 계속해서 리더보드의 랭킹을 올려 자신을 증명하십시오.
description.russian: Получи все достижения. После этого ты несомненно станешь одним из лучших игроков на планете, возможно даже самым лучшим! Продолжай доказывать это в таблице лидеров!
description.schinese: 获得所有成就。你肯定是这个星球上最出色的的玩家之一了！也许你就是最出色的的那个！到排行榜上来证明自己吧！
description.spanish: Consigue todos los logros. Cuando lo consigas serás uno de los mejores jugadores del planeta, ¡quizá el mejor que ha existido nunca! Demuéstralo en los marcadores
